item.description:
As the book list for 2009 is still "under development," we will start the new year with the discussion of two interesting articles that are available on line. The first is a classic early teaching of the Ch'an/Zen tradition entitled "The Ten Oxherding pictures." You can access this illustrated document at:

http://www.buddhismto...

The second document is an essay entitled "Buddhism and Present Life" by the late Venerable Dr. K Sri Dhammananda that I find to be a good review and discussion of what sets Buddhism apart from other religions. You will find a few obvious word errors and ommissions in the article, apparently due to hasty word processing, but this doesn't detract. I thought the article may be particularly helpful to newcomers. You will find it at:

http://www.buddhismto...

For information on the late learned teacher Dr. K Sri Dhammananda:

http://www.ksridhamma...

I thank my friends at the Chua Phuoc Dien Temple in Manchester for pointing out these articles, and the very interesting www.buddhismtoday.com website to me.

I will look forward to our meeting on the 12th!

Aurore

(If the links above do not work, please send me an e-mail and I will send them to you in an e-mail - dharmastudy@aol.com)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a small sign on the cafe table saying "book discussion"
item.name: The Ten Oxherding Pictures and More
